attributes.action: We want a proper May half term holiday, not one with a Bank Holiday within it.
attributes.additional_details: Teachers have worked endlessly during the pandemic. Why should it be included as part of our half term? Its a gained day yet it is being taken away from our half term. Something needs to change
attributes.background: Adjust the May Half Term 2022 to accommodate the extra bank holiday gained for the Queens 70th celebration. 2 days of the Half Term has been used. Either we break up a week before (Friday 20th May 2022) OR include the 2 day bank hoilday from the Thursday 2nd June 2022 with the following week

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Term dates are a decision for schools and local authorities.
